comment._content: <del>? Possibly John Kirkwood (Service No. 2064), Occupation: Driver; Northcote, Victoria...Age 24 on enlistment in 1915...</del>

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/51979177@N02] Hmm I'm thinking that looks like a British badge on his cap - possibly Army Service Corp. There is a WW1 medal card at the NAA UK for a Private John Kirkwood ASC R/310686 but no more detail available in that record...
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
